channel.title: Completed Source from Scratch
channel.description:
Does anyone know a completed source from scratch (non-Winterlove) that will work with a 317 client? I don't know enough java to make my own from scratch, but I'd be interested in working on one that's unkown/unused to be my very own source. Also, does anyone know a truly customized client that is legal to use? If not, does anyone have the framework of a client that is legal to use that I can build upon?
Thanks much,
TheCyberMan
P.S. I know the link to the 4 servers coded from scratch, but those weren't complete. Also, some had scripts like python in them, but I want an all-Java server.

item.description:
@Xata27 wrote:

item.title: Completed Source from Scratch
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

This is the section that’s close enough to deal with my topic. It’s server help…what other section would I put it in? And how the hell would I be leeching a source if I intend to build one from the barest of frameworks?! You understand I’m asking for a bare to the bone server that I intend to improve with skills and stuff. I understand some people are downright clueless, but even to the extent where I want to try hard, you still can be heartless…that’s cold for even my level.

Read full topic

item.title: Completed Source from Scratch
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

That’s called leeching.
No request’s, why don’t you head on over to the server download’s section and find one there.

Read full topic
